article_text: “Florida has many qualified people, but they don’t seem to stay here. Our experience is that it is difficult to find qualified, skilled people for decision-making roles in our company and almost always must recruit from out of state.” — Ben Baldanza, CEO, Spirit Airlines

article_metadata.news-keywords: chief executive officers, South Florida, CEOs, Q&A, questions

article_summary:
“Florida has many qualified people, but they don’t seem to stay here.
Our experience is that it is difficult to find qualified, skilled people for decision-making roles in our company and almost always must recruit from out of state.” — Ben Baldanza, CEO, Spirit Airlines
